game.shortDescription: Pure 2D chaos made of particles, relentless waves, run-based builds and permanent upgrades. No story. just the future of arcade survival. â„™articulitiğ• is a survivor action roguelite from a parallel timeline where 2D arcade games never stopped evolving.
